Detailed Description

template<class T>
class ebl::IdxLooper< T >

IdxLooper: a kind of iterator used by bloop and eloop macros. IdxLooper is a subclass of Idx, It is used as follows: for (IdxLooper z(&idx,0); z.notdone(); z.next()) { .... }
